elements.title: Icebreaker One
elements.description: Icebreaker's mission is to Unlock standards-based marketplaces for environmental & financial data and leveraged finance for innovation. Reduce the cost and friction associated with moving data across organisations and markets. Won [phase 2 of SBRI MEDA](https://icebreakerone.org/energy/) competion

elements.title: Carbon Intelligence
elements.description: London based Carbon Intelligence brings together a team of strategists, technologists, data scientists and engineers. Our sustainability experts believe in business as the solution to a zero-carbon economy, not the problem.

elements.title: GreenEnco
elements.description: We are providing engineering & technical services and asset performance management to the solar PV stakeholders, from concept planning through to completion.

elements.title: Roadnight Taylor
elements.description: Helping UK businesses and organisations make the best and safest energy choices that deliver against their specific objectives –  whether that’s reducing bills, generating income, shrinking carbon footprint or increasing resilience and competitiveness.

elements.title: Ongen
elements.description: helping organisations and small businesses save money on energy costs, reduce carbon footprint and secure energy supply.

elements.title: Delta EE
elements.description: Delta-EE provides research to the new energy industry through research services and bespoke consultancy projects, depending on the individual client's needs.

elements.title: Avieco - formerly Carbon Smart
elements.description: Avieco / Carbon Smart help businesses take the sustainability steps that make sense to them
